body.name: Seventh Generation Baby Wipes Sensitive Protection with Snap Seal Unscented Baby Wipes 64 Count
features: Diaper wipe made for your baby’s sensitive skin
Thick and soft baby wipe for a gentle clean that is safe for baby, hands, and face
Seventh Generation baby wipes unscented with 0% fragrance, alcohol, parabens, or phenoxyethanol
Hypoallergenic unscented baby wipes and dermatologist tested
Easy dispensing flip-top lid keeps wipes moist and fresh, contains 64 wipes
Caring today for the next seven generations with our unscented wipes
body.description: Smooth, soft, and clean – the way a baby’s bottom should be. Seventh Generation Baby Wipes are made for baby’s sensitive skin and contain 0% fragrance, alcohol, parabens, or phenoxyethanol. Our thick, soft wipes are strong enough for big messes while being gentle on newborn baby’s most precious, delicate skin. These diaper wipes are moistened with plant-derived skin conditioners like aloe vera and are safe for baby, hands, and face. The flip-top package design locks in moisture to keep wet wipes fresh and allow for easy, on-the-go dispensing. Our hypoallergenic and fragrance free baby wipes are dermatologist tested and clinically proven to be gentle on baby’s skin. It’s all good, wipes baby will want. Caring for a little human is a magical undertaking, and we’ve developed an entire line of baby skin care products, unscented baby wipes, and baby diapers to bring peace of mind to your journey. For every life-changing milestone, you deserve baby care you can trust. At Seventh Generation, we do business differently. We believe our products are healthy solutions for use within your home–and for the community and environment outside it. We are always evaluating how to reduce their environmental impact, increase performance and safety, and create a more sustainable supply chain. Furthermore, we believe it is our responsibility to set a course for a more mindful way of doing business, where companies act as partners with other stakeholders to create a brighter future for the whole planet. Seventh Generation is proud to be a Certified B Corporation. B Corps are certified to be better for workers, better for communities, and better for the environment. By choosing Seventh Generation products, you’re joining us in nurturing the health of the next seven generations.

productInformation.value: #17,082 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #141 in Diaper Wipes & Refills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive babies
reviews.reviewText: My littles have very sensitive skin, and these wipes are perfect for them. The wipes are plush, soft, and thick. These are the only wipes that my kids can use without irritation. Even my hubby noticed the difference in quality of these wipes compared with the other leading wipes on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve always been sensitive and never used a commercial wipe until these. They are fantastic, no burning or redness for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for kitties - really!
reviews.reviewText: I have a kitty who sometimes gets too excited and will run out of the litter box before every drop of pee is out. She’ll get a little pee dribble down her back leg. When this happens, I grab her and give her booty and back legs a good wipe down with these wipes. They’re sturdy and don’t tear apart, but are soft enough on her fur and little booty. The scent is clean, not at all overwhelming. They work well for our random non-baby/diaper needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great wipes. Better opening would make 5 stars.
reviews.reviewText: These wipes work well. Very gentle and no strong deodorant smell. It is great to have a wipe that doesn't have a baby wipe smell. The opening could be improved. I understand that the lack of a lid opening is most likely for environmental reasons and I respect a purist approach. But when you have a squirming toddler or fussy baby it is not always convenient to make sure you open them carefully to avoid tearing the opening which we found way too easy to do. We are way past the diaper year's but still find great value in having wipes handy. I will buy these again but hope they might consider improving the opening for a more successful reseal. In the meantime I will just put them in a large ziploc to compensate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good value. Work well. No scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I like that this baby wipes is really soft and that it’s not too runny with the liquid and that it doesn’t tear after one wipe. the thickness is pretty sturdy too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars (clean) hands down the best wipes you can buy
reviews.reviewText: There are no comparable wipes out there. We have twins and a toddler. More poop than anyone should have to deal with. We have literally tried every brand of wipes available from the cheapest to the most organic and premium brands. The thickness and strength of these wipes is at least twice that of anything else out there. We can regularly change a diaper with just 1 wipe but almost never needing more than 2, even for the toddler. Buying these in quantities of 600 or 1200 with subscription also makes them very affordable. it is a complete bonus that they are very good for our babies, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for my 4 month old who is sensitive to other baby wipes
